text:
Well, it was during Christmas time. I was dressed as a reindeer, and I had blinking earrings, and I had the antlers on, and my sweater was blinking and all that — and my mom was like, ‘When did you become an eight-year-old?’ And I said, ‘I feel younger now.’ … I feel less like I have anything to prove.

I think when you are a teenager, young adult, you’re trying so hard to be cool or to prove something or to be something away from who you’ve been as a kid. And I guess as I’ve gotten older — what Younger Now says is, even though it’s not who I am, I’m not afraid of who I used to be.
title: Miley Cyrus - Younger Now Lyrics and Tracklist
